sentences.sCn: 澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。

sentences.sContent: ...A person with curiosity is likely to find the essence of problems and overcome various difficulties...
...also be that Obama's success helps people to forget that a disproportionate number of black Americans still live in poverty and face huge obstacles when trying to overcome these circumstances...

trans.tranCn: 战胜， 克服； 压倒， 使受不了
trans.tranOther: to fight and win against someone or something
